duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide on-site technical assistance in the installation, repair, preventative maintenance, and operational training of assigned equipment.
Monitor critical accounts and actively participate in support activities to accomplish quick and effective problem resolution.
Install and remove equipment and systems as required.
Work closely with the scheduler team, manage and perform preventative maintenance on trained equipment.
Develop strong business relationships with customers and client personnel.
Complete all required reporting procedures related to the maintenance and repair of the equipment.
Complete all required administrative tasks in an accurate and timely manner.
Attend training classes and develop necessary knowledge and skills to service supported equipment and to advance to a higher level position.
Communicate technical and escalated issues to management.
Perform related duties as assigned by manager.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED equivalent (Bachelor's Degree preferred)
